mapper.insert: insert into ec_assets_per (cust_no, seq_no, assets_nam, assets_typ, stored_amt, obtain_time, expire_time, establish_time, principal, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{assetsNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetsTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storedAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{obtainTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{establishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{principal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ec_assets_per set assets_nam = #{assetsNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assets_typ = #{assetsTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stored_amt = #{storedAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, obtain_time = #{obtainTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, expire_time = #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, establish_time = #{establishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, principal = #{principal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and seq_no = #{seqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select cust_no, seq_no, assets_nam, assets_typ, stored_amt, obtain_time, expire_time, establish_time, principal, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_assets_per

select cust_no, seq_no, assets_nam, assets_typ, stored_amt, obtain_time, expire_time, establish_time, principal, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_assets_per where cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rec_stat = '0'
and assets_nam like '%'||#{assetsNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and principal like '%'||#{principal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
order by establish_time desc
mapper.delete: delete from ec_assets_per where cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and seq_no = #{seqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select nvl(max(seq_no)+1,0) from ec_assets_per where cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
